title: Home Page
description: Content for the home page of your website.

sets.title: Hero Section
sets.description: Main message and call-to-actions shown at the top of the page.

fields.label: What should the main headline say?
fields.description: A clear and direct statement about what you offer.
fields.helper: Keep it short and avoid special symbols.
fields.example: Professional Music Learning for All

rules.patternMessage: Use simple English text with basic punctuation only.

fields.label: What supporting line should appear under the headline?
fields.description: A brief line that adds clarity to your headline.
fields.helper: One clean sentence. No marketing buzzwords.
fields.example: Structured guidance to help you grow with confidence.

fields.label: Add short punchlines you want to highlight
fields.description: Optional short points that reinforce your message.

fields.label: Describe the images you want here
fields.description: Explain what each image should show. No file uploads needed.

group.label: Explain the image in simple detail
group.example: A close-up shot of a learner practicing acoustic guitar in a warm, bright environment.

fields.label: Add buttons for this section
fields.description: Buttons visitors can click on.

group.label: Where should this button lead?
group.description: Describe the destination in simple words.

sets.title: Introduction Section
sets.description: A brief section that introduces your brand to visitors.

fields.label: What is the main title for this section?
fields.description: A clear and simple title that introduces your brand or message.
fields.example: Welcome to Our Platform

fields.label: Do you want a short supporting line below the title?
fields.description: A brief line that adds clarity to the title.
fields.example: Helping learners grow with structured guidance.

fields.label: How would you describe your brand in 1–2 short paragraphs?
fields.description: A clear explanation of what you do and why it matters.
fields.helper: Use simple English. End sentences with proper punctuation.
fields.example: We help learners build real musical skills through structured training. Our approach focuses on consistency, clarity, and real-world growth.

rules.patternMessage: Write a proper paragraph using normal English punctuation.

fields.label: List any short highlight points you want to show
fields.description: Short points that quickly explain what makes you valuable.

fields.label: Describe the images for this section
fields.description: Explain what each image should show. No actual files needed.

group.label: Explain the image clearly
group.example: An image that reflects our values, such as a team working together or a learner practicing.

rules.patternMessage: Describe the image using simple English.

sets.title: What We Do Section
sets.description: Explain what your brand offers in a simple and clear way.

fields.label: What is the main title for this section?
fields.description: A simple title that tells visitors what this section is about.
fields.example: What We Do

fields.label: How would you describe your main offerings?
fields.description: A brief explanation of what you provide.
fields.helper: Write clear sentences. Avoid technical jargon.
fields.example: We provide structured learning programs designed to help you build real musical skills at your own pace.

fields.label: List the key things you offer
fields.description: Add each main offering as a separate item.

group.label: Do you want to add a short supporting line for this offering?
How would you explain this offering?
group.example: We design a custom learning path based on your goals, strengths, and areas of improvement.

group.label: If this offering needs an icon, describe what the icon should represent.
Describe the type of image that fits this offering.
group.example: A student practicing guitar with a mentor

group.label: Where should users go if they click on this offering?
group.description: Describe the destination in simple words.
group.helper: Examples: 'detailed services page', 'courses page', 'about our programs section'.

sets.title: How We Work Section
sets.description: Explain how your process or approach works in simple steps.

fields.label: What is the main title for this section?
fields.description: A direct title explaining this section’s purpose.
fields.example: How We Work

fields.label: Do you want a short line to introduce your process?
fields.description: A simple sentence that prepares visitors for the steps.
fields.example: A simple process designed to help you improve steadily.

fields.label: How would you briefly describe your overall approach?
fields.description: A short explanation of how your process helps users.
fields.example: We follow a simple step-by-step model that guides you from the basics to advanced skills while keeping you consistent and motivated.

fields.label: List the main steps of your process
fields.description: Describe each step clearly so visitors understand how you work.

group.label: Short supporting line for this step
group.example: We learn what you want to achieve

group.label: Explain this step in simple words
group.example: We start by understanding your goals and current skill level so that we can build a clear path for your progress.

group.label: Describe the type of icon that fits this step
Describe an image that represents this step
group.example: A student discussing goals with a mentor

group.label: Where should users go if they click on this step?
group.description: Describe the destination in simple words.
group.helper: Example: 'detailed process page', 'mentorship section', 'training programs page'.

sets.title: What We Provide Section
sets.description: Explain the key things you offer to your users.

fields.label: What is the main title for this section?
fields.description: A short title that clearly states what you provide.
fields.example: What We Provide

fields.label: How would you describe the overall value you provide?
fields.description: A short explanation of what users receive from you.
fields.helper: Focus on benefits. Use simple English.
fields.example: We offer structured learning, expert guidance, and a clear path that helps you grow with confidence.

fields.label: List what you provide
fields.description: Add each item that represents something you provide to your users.

group.label: Short supporting line for this item
How would you explain this item?
group.example: Our mentors guide you through every step of your learning journey, helping you improve steadily.

group.label: Describe the type of icon that suits this item
group.example: A star icon or a guidance symbol

group.label: Describe an image that suits this item
group.example: A mentor teaching a student in a calm environment

group.label: Where should users go if they want to know more?
group.description: Explain the destination in simple words.

sets.title: Featured Media Section
sets.description: Showcase important images, videos, or audio that represent your brand.

fields.label: What is the main title for this section?
fields.description: A short title that explains the purpose of the media shown here.
fields.example: Featured Media

fields.label: How would you describe the purpose of this section?
fields.description: Explain why this media is important for visitors to see.
fields.example: A collection of media that highlights our learning approach, student progress, and brand vision.

fields.label: Describe the images you want to feature
fields.description: Explain each image clearly so our team understands what to create or select.

group.label: What should this image show?
group.example: A student practicing piano with focus

group.label: Describe the image in detail
group.example: A well-lit room with a learner playing piano, showing focus and concentration.

fields.label: Describe the videos you want to feature
fields.description: Explain the purpose of each video. No links needed.

group.label: What should this video highlight?
group.example: A walkthrough of our learning platform

group.label: Describe the video clearly
group.example: A short demonstration video showing how learners navigate lessons and track progress.

fields.label: Describe the audio clips you want to feature
fields.description: Explain what each audio clip should contain.

group.label: What should this audio represent?
group.example: A sample of a student's progress

group.label: Describe the audio clip
group.example: A clean guitar recording showing improvement in accuracy and rhythm.

sets.title: Reviews Preview Section
sets.description: Show a short preview of customer reviews or ratings to build trust.

fields.label: What title should appear above the reviews?
fields.description: A short title introducing your customer feedback.
fields.example: What Our Students Say

fields.label: How would you describe this review section to visitors?
fields.description: Explain why these reviews matter.
fields.example: Real feedback from learners who experienced steady progress through our training.

fields.label: What is your overall rating score?
fields.description: Your average rating out of 5.
fields.helper: Enter whole numbers only. Decimals are not allowed.

fields.label: How many total reviews do you have?
fields.description: Total number of customer reviews collected.

fields.label: List the platforms where your reviews exist
fields.description: Name the platforms where customers have posted feedback.

group.label: What is the name of the review platform?
How would you describe this platform to visitors?
group.example: Google's public review page where students often share detailed feedback.

fields.label: Add individual review previews
fields.description: Provide short excerpts from real customer reviews.

group.label: What is the reviewer's first name?
What did the reviewer say?
group.example: The learning experience was excellent, and the progress tracking helped me stay motivated.

group.label: What is the main highlight of this review?

sets.title: Testimonials Section
sets.description: Show real feedback from your clients or users.

fields.label: What is the main title for this section?
fields.description: A short title introducing the customer testimonials.
fields.example: Trusted by Our Students

fields.label: How would you describe this testimonials section?
fields.description: A brief explanation about why these testimonials matter.
fields.helper: Use short sentences that build confidence.
fields.example: Here are some honest experiences shared by customers who have worked with us.

fields.label: Add individual testimonials
fields.description: Provide clear details for each testimonial.

group.label: What is the reviewer's first name?
What is their role or relationship to your service?
What did this person say about your service?
group.example: The learning approach was very structured and helped me improve consistently.

group.label: What is the main takeaway from their feedback?
Describe the type of image that should represent this reviewer
group.description: A short description of how the reviewer should visually appear.
group.helper: Do not provide an image. Only describe the look.
group.example: A young professional smiling confidently in a clean indoor setting.

sets.title: Call-To-Action Banner
sets.description: A strong invitation for visitors to take the next step.

fields.label: What is the main title of this banner?
fields.description: A short and clear title that motivates the visitor to act.
fields.example: Start Your Journey Today

fields.label: What message should appear below the title?
fields.description: Explain the benefit of taking action in simple, meaningful words.
fields.helper: Use short sentences that encourage action.
fields.example: If you are ready to begin, our team will help you take the next step with confidence.

fields.label: Add action buttons for this banner
fields.description: Buttons help visitors reach the next step easily.

group.label: Where should this button take the visitor?
group.description: Describe the page or section this button should lead to. No URLs required.
group.helper: Use simple names like 'contact page', 'book a call', or 'services page'.

fields.label: List any icons you want to display in the banner
fields.description: Short words describing the style or idea of the icon.

title: About Page
description: Content for the About page of your website.

sets.title: Hero Section
sets.description: The first section visitors see on the About page.

fields.label: What is the main title for this section?
fields.description: A short and clear headline that introduces your identity.
fields.example: Who We Are

fields.label: How would you introduce your organisation to visitors?
fields.description: A short introduction explaining who you are.
fields.example: We are a dedicated team focused on delivering high-quality learning experiences with honesty and commitment.

fields.label: Add short taglines for this section
fields.description: These are brief phrases supporting your main message.

group.label: What short phrase would you like to display?

fields.label: Describe the images you want for this section
fields.description: Explain the type of images that should appear here.

group.label: What should this image show?
group.example: Our team working together in a clean workspace

group.label: Describe the image in detail
group.example: A bright room with team members collaborating around a table, expressing focus and positivity.

fields.label: Add buttons for this section
fields.description: Buttons guide visitors to important next steps.

group.label: Where should this button take the visitor?
group.description: Describe the page or section destination. No URLs required.

sets.title: Story Section
sets.description: Share the background and journey of your organisation.

fields.label: What title should introduce your story?
fields.description: A short and clear title for your background story.
fields.example: Our Journey

fields.label: How would you describe your overall story?
fields.description: A clear summary of how your organisation began and what shaped it.
fields.example: We began with a small team and a clear purpose: to build reliable and meaningful learning experiences. Over time, our values, discipline, and commitment helped us grow steadily.

fields.label: Add important milestones or turning points
fields.description: Short statements that highlight key moments in your journey.

group.label: What key milestone should be shown?
group.example: Launched our first structured training program

fields.label: Describe images that represent your story
fields.description: Explain the type of images that should reflect your journey.

group.label: What should this image show?
group.example: Our early workspace where everything started

group.label: Describe the image clearly
group.example: A modest but organised room with basic equipment, showing the simplicity and determination of our early days.

fields.label: Describe videos that support your story
fields.description: Explain what each video should convey.

group.label: What should this video highlight?
group.example: A short clip showing how our work evolved over time

group.label: Describe the video clearly
group.example: A simple narrative-style video showing our early days, important decisions, and how our core values shaped every step forward.

sets.title: Vision Section
sets.description: Explain the long-term direction and aspirations of your organisation.

fields.label: What title should introduce your vision?
fields.description: A short and clear heading for your vision statement.
fields.example: Our Vision

fields.label: How would you describe your long-term vision?
fields.description: Explain what you aim to achieve in the future.
fields.helper: Use clear sentences that show direction and purpose.
fields.example: We aim to create a learning environment where every individual gains access to structured, meaningful, and reliable growth opportunities.

fields.label: List important points that support your vision
fields.description: Short statements explaining the core ideas behind your vision.

group.label: What key point supports your vision?
group.example: Making structured learning accessible to all

fields.label: Describe images that represent your vision
fields.description: Explain the type of images that visually express your long-term goal.

group.label: What should this image show?
group.example: Students learning confidently with supportive guidance

group.label: Describe the image clearly
group.example: A bright and modern learning environment where individuals feel confident and motivated to grow.

sets.title: Mission Section
sets.description: Explain the core purpose and daily commitment of your organisation.

fields.label: What title should introduce your mission?
fields.description: A short heading explaining your organisation’s purpose.
fields.example: Our Mission

fields.label: How would you describe your mission?
fields.description: A clear explanation of what you aim to do every day.
fields.helper: Use simple sentences that clearly explain your purpose.
fields.example: Our mission is to deliver dependable learning experiences that help individuals grow steadily through structure, clarity, and guided progression.

fields.label: List key points that define your mission
fields.description: Short statements describing the actions or commitments that make up your mission.

group.label: What is one important mission point?
group.example: Delivering structured and reliable learning systems

fields.label: Describe images that represent your mission
fields.description: Explain the type of images that show your organisation’s objectives in action.

group.label: What should this image show?
group.example: An instructor guiding a learner with personal attention

group.label: Describe the image clearly
group.example: A clean training setup where a dedicated instructor helps a student understand concepts methodically.

sets.title: Values Section
sets.description: Present the core principles your organisation follows every day.

fields.label: What title should introduce your values?
fields.description: A short and clear heading explaining your principles.
fields.example: Our Values

fields.label: How would you describe the importance of your values?
fields.description: Explain why these principles guide your organisation.
fields.example: Our values guide every decision we make, ensuring that our work stays consistent, reliable, and focused on meaningful outcomes.

fields.label: List the core values you follow
fields.description: Short statements explaining each principle clearly.

group.label: What is the name of this value?
How would you describe this value?
group.example: We remain honest and transparent in every decision and interaction.

fields.label: Describe images that represent your values
fields.description: Explain the type of images that reflect your principles.

group.label: What should this image show?
group.example: A team collaborating with clarity and openness

group.label: Describe the image clearly
group.example: A simple and clean workspace where team members openly discuss ideas and maintain a professional environment.

sets.title: Team Section
sets.description: Introduce the people who represent your organisation.

fields.label: What title should introduce your team?
fields.description: A short heading presenting your team.
fields.example: Meet Our Team

fields.label: How would you describe your team?
fields.description: A short explanation about the people who drive your organisation.
fields.example: Our team is made up of dedicated individuals who value discipline, clarity, and meaningful work.

fields.label: Add your team members
fields.description: Provide the details for each member clearly.

group.label: What is this team member's full name?
Write a short bio for this member
group.example: Rahul has over 10 years of experience helping learners build confidence and progress with structure and discipline.

group.label: Describe how this member should appear in their photo
group.description: A clear description for the image. No photos are required.
group.helper: Describe the environment, clothing, expressions, or general vibe.
group.example: A friendly, professional portrait with a clean background and confident posture.

group.label: List notable qualities for this member
group.description: Short phrases that describe their strengths.

group.label: What is one quality of this member?

sets.title: Media Showcase Section
sets.description: Display important images, videos, or audio that represent your organisation.

fields.label: What title should introduce this media section?
fields.description: A short heading explaining what this media represents.
fields.example: Our Work in Action

fields.label: How would you describe the purpose of this media?
fields.description: Explain why this media is meaningful for visitors.
fields.example: A collection of images and videos that highlight our approach, progress, and everyday work.

fields.label: Describe the images you want to showcase
fields.description: Explain the purpose and look of each image.

group.label: What should this image show?
group.example: Instructors guiding learners through practical sessions

group.label: Describe the image clearly
group.example: A bright training space where learners and instructors work together with focus and discipline.

fields.label: Describe the videos you want to showcase
fields.description: Explain the purpose and message of each video.

group.label: What should this video highlight?
group.example: A walkthrough showing how individuals progress through training sessions

group.label: Describe the video clearly
group.example: A clean, simple video showing learners progressing steadily with structured guidance.

fields.label: Describe the audio clips you want to showcase
fields.description: Explain what each audio clip should convey.

group.label: What should this audio represent?
group.example: A learner’s improvement over a period of consistent practice

group.label: Describe the audio clearly
group.example: A clean recording showing improvement in rhythm, timing, and confidence over multiple sessions.

sets.title: Call-To-Action Banner
sets.description: A short, strong invitation for visitors to take action on the About page.

fields.label: What is the main banner title?
fields.description: A short, direct line that encourages action.
fields.example: Join Our Programs Today

rules.patternMessage: Only letters, numbers, spaces and basic punctuation are allowed.

fields.label: What brief message appears under the title?
fields.description: Explain the benefit of acting now in simple terms.
fields.helper: 2–3 short sentences. End with proper punctuation.
fields.example: If you want structured learning and real progress, join our programs and start with a personalised plan.

rules.patternMessage: Use normal English sentences with standard punctuation.

fields.label: Add up to two buttons for this banner
fields.description: Each button needs a short text label and a simple destination description (path).

rules.patternMessage: Keep it short and plain (letters, numbers and spaces only).

group.label: Button destination (simple description)
group.description: Write where the button should lead (no URLs).

fields.label: List small icon ideas to accompany the banner
fields.description: Optional short names describing icons (one per entry).

fields.label: Describe any supporting image for the banner
fields.description: Optional — describe the image concept, not the file.

group.label: Briefly describe the image
group.example: A learner smiling while holding a certificate in a clean indoor setting.

title: Contact Page
description: Content for the contact page of your website.

sets.title: Intro Section
sets.description: A short introduction encouraging visitors to reach out.

fields.label: What is the main title for this section?
fields.description: A short heading that welcomes visitors to contact you.
fields.example: Get in Touch

fields.label: What message would you like to show under the title?
fields.description: Explain why visitors should reach out.
fields.example: If you have questions or need guidance, we are here to help. Reach out and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

fields.label: Add short supportive taglines
fields.description: Small one-line phrases reinforcing the message.

group.label: What short tagline should appear here?

fields.label: Describe images that should appear in this section
fields.description: Explain the idea of each image. No files needed.

group.label: What should this image show?
group.example: A friendly staff member assisting a customer

group.label: Describe the image clearly
group.example: A clean and simple office setting where a staff member is smiling while offering assistance.

sets.title: Contact Details Section
sets.description: Show all the ways someone can reach you.

fields.label: What title should appear above your contact details?
fields.description: A short heading introducing your contact information.
fields.example: Contact Information

fields.label: What message should appear under the contact title?
fields.description: A short sentence explaining how visitors can reach you.
fields.example: You may reach us through any of the contact options below. We will respond as soon as possible.

fields.label: Add your physical addresses
fields.description: Include full addresses that visitors may need.

fields.label: Add phone numbers
fields.description: Provide official phone numbers visitors can call.

rules.patternMessage: Only numbers, spaces, and + symbol allowed.

group.label: What should this number be called?
group.description: Describe the purpose of this number.

fields.label: Add email addresses
fields.description: Provide official emails for support or enquiries.

group.label: What is the purpose of this email?

fields.label: Add your social media handles
fields.description: Include accounts where visitors can reach or follow you.

group.label: What is the name of the platform?
What is your username or handle on this platform?

sets.title: Contact Form Section
sets.description: Collect the specific details you want from visitors who reach out through the form.

fields.label: What title should appear above the form?
fields.description: A short heading inviting visitors to submit a message.
fields.example: Send Us a Message

fields.label: What short message should appear under the form title?
fields.description: Explain why the visitor should submit the form.
fields.example: Fill out the form below and our team will respond as soon as possible.

fields.label: List the fields you want in the contact form
fields.description: Describe each input field you want visitors to fill.

group.label: What should this field be called?
group.description: This is the name of the field shown to visitors.

group.label: What type of field is this?
group.description: Choose the type of input the visitor must provide.

group.label: Is this field required?
group.description: Choose if the visitor must fill this field.

group.label: What simple guidance should appear under this field?
group.example: Enter your full name as it appears officially.

fields.label: Add the form submission button
fields.description: Describe the button text and its purpose.

group.label: Where should this button lead after submission?
group.description: Describe the destination or what should happen next.
group.helper: Examples: 'show success message', 'redirect to thank you page'.

sets.title: Social Links Section
sets.description: Show the social platforms where visitors can connect with you.

fields.label: What title should appear above your social links?
fields.description: A simple heading that introduces your social presence.
fields.example: Connect With Us

fields.label: What short message should appear under the title?
fields.description: Explain why visitors should connect with you on social platforms.
fields.example: Follow us on our social platforms to stay updated with our latest news, programs, and achievements.

fields.label: List icon ideas for social links
fields.description: These are optional short names describing the icon style.

group.label: What icon idea do you want for this platform?

fields.label: Add your social media accounts
fields.description: Provide details for each platform you want to show.

group.label: What is the name of the platform?
What is your username on this platform?
How would you describe the purpose of this platform?
group.example: We share important updates, behind-the-scenes work, and progress stories from our learners.

sets.title: FAQ Section
sets.description: A list of common questions and answers to help visitors quickly find the information they need.

fields.label: What title should appear above your FAQ list?
fields.description: A simple heading that introduces the frequently asked questions.
fields.example: Frequently Asked Questions

fields.label: What short message should appear under the FAQ title?
fields.description: Explain the purpose of the FAQ list in simple words.
fields.example: Here are answers to some of the most common questions we receive. This helps you find information quickly.

fields.label: Add each question and answer
fields.description: Provide a list of clear questions and detailed answers.

group.label: What is the question?
group.description: Enter one question that visitors commonly ask.
group.example: How soon can I expect a reply?

group.label: What is the answer to this question?
group.description: Provide a clear explanation that solves the visitor’s doubt.
group.helper: Avoid technical terms. Use plain, direct language.
group.example: Our team usually responds within 24–48 hours on business days. For urgent situations, we may reply sooner.
